headline: 'Starbucks Must End Its Greed'—Bernie Sanders Calls Out Starbucks CEO For Getting $96 Million For 4 Months Of Work
summary: Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-VT) is calling out Starbucks (NASDAQ:SBUX) after the company paid new CEO Brian Niccol about $96 million for just four months of work last year. In an online post, Sanders criticized the pay package while union workers struggle to secure fair wages. Sanders Slams Starbucks Over Executive Pay "If you’re the Starbucks CEO you get $96 million for 4 months of work including a $5 million bonus. If you’re a Starbucks union worker, the CEO is refusing to give you a decent raise t
